keywordReminderTexts.reminder: You can move me through any number of empty spaces on my diagonal, as if it were 1 space (for N purposes).
I can move through X Ethereal characters to an empty space, then I lose X E. This also counts as moving 1 space for N purposes.
You can destroy a Memory attached to me to echo me.

When I die, annihilate me.
You can pip revive me at half cost.
When I'm hand->discarded, discard->cast a DIFFERENT Crazy Idea for 1 pip.
When this character dies (while I'm equipped), discard->hand me.
When turns start, I attack an adjacent character.
When you start friendly turns controlling a Sportsball, discard->cast me.
Can't be cast normally.
While I'm inactive, I can't attack or move.

When I fight, kill me.
When another character arrives adjacent to a Supplicant:

When a non-Weather character arrives here, apply the listed effect.
When turns start, deck->cast a Weather Condition adjacent to me, then annihilate me.

Summon me only where Weather overlaps other Weather.
When I'm summoned, each Weather Condition I'm in:
Hand->summon a Weather Event in that Weather Condition's overlap with other Weather.
Dying during an enemy turn.
When I'm summoned, or when turns start, move me 1 space. When I move:
Discard your deck's top card until you discard an appropriate character. Revive them.
You can pip discard->cast me, then immediately annihilate me.
When turns start, swap me for a Wanderer in your deck with less S. (They won't wander until next turn.)
Must be played in Water, but doesn't have to be played adjacent to a friendly card.
When nothing is happening, if I'm not in Water, kill me.
After I move in a straight line, except by this effect, move me 1 space in the same direction.
When this character defends, pass me to your Avatar.
When nothing is happening and I'm adjacent to fewer than that many friendly characters, I die.
Northeast, northwest, southeast, or southwest.
When a character kills this one, they pick me up.
Annihilate me. Hand->summon a Mech Golem where I was and activate it. When it dies, summon me where it was and negate me until the next turn starts.
Can move through cards.
The first time each stack I'm activated, pulse adjacent characters. (Activate, then deactivate each.)
When I'm summoned, I attack an adjacent W X enemy. Give them -X W until the battle ends. This uses my attack for the turn.
When I attack, hand->discard X cards. Give me +2*X W until the battle ends.
The first time each round I fight a W X character, give them -X W for that fight.
If there's no appropriate cards here, dispel me.
Once each turn, you can pip hand->cast a Rune.
Hand->discard 1 card, then draw 1 card.
Hand->discard 1 card, then draw 1 card.
Can't move or attack normally.
When you summon a Warrior adjacent to me, give them:
3 attacks each turn.
1 turn after I die, revive me where I died.
When I deal X more damage than my defender has E, give their Avatar -X E.
When I deal X more damage than my defender has E, give enemies adjacent to them -X E.
When this character arrives, attach me to an adjacent character.
When a character arrives adjacent to me, attach me to them.
Twice each turn, you can swap a Mask attached to me for one in your hand.
Characters can only wear one Mask.
Once each turn, you can teleport me to a space adjacent to a friendly.
When I die, discard->reshuffle me.
A character with less E than printed (the E number is red).
Increase a character's E to its starting value (the E number is black). If the character has more E than they started with, nothing happens.
When I'm summoned, hand->attach up to # Modules to me, then draw the same number of cards.
keywordReminderTexts.technicalReminder: When I'm summoned, hand->attach [X <= #] Modules to me, then draw X cards.

keywordReminderTexts.reminder:
When an enemy arrives here, I vanish.
When I'm cast, show 2 Cryptids in your hand. Secretly choose one. When I vanish, hand->summon it where I was.
When I'm summoned, I attack a character within my radius.
